# Hosts

host minecraft:stone
type stone
hardness 1.5
resistance 10
texture minecraft:blocks/stone

host minecraft:stone:1
type stone
hardness 1.5
resistance 10
texture minecraft:blocks/stone_granite

host minecraft:stone:3
type stone
hardness 1.5
resistance 10
texture minecraft:blocks/stone_diorite

host minecraft:stone:5
type stone
hardness 1.5
resistance 10
texture minecraft:blocks/stone_andesite

host minecraft:dirt
type ground
hardness 0.5
texture minecraft:blocks/dirt

host minecraft:dirt:1
type ground
hardness 0.5
texture minecraft:blocks/coarse_dirt

host minecraft:sand
type sand
hardness 0.5
texture minecraft:blocks/sand

host minecraft:sand:1
type sand
hardness 0.5
texture minecraft:blocks/red_sand

# gravel has no possibility of surface tension like sand.
# This makes it weird as a host when it can't fall.
host minecraft:gravel
type gravel
hardness 0.6
texture minecraft:blocks/gravel

host minecraft:sandstone
type stone
hardness 0.8
texture minecraft:blocks/sandstone_normal
textureUp minecraft:blocks/sandstone_top
textureDown minecraft:blocks/sandstone_bottom

host minecraft:clay
type ground
hardness 0.6
texture minecraft:blocks/clay

host minecraft:hardened_clay
type stone
hardness 1.25
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay

host minecraft:netherrack
type stone
hardness 0.4
texture minecraft:blocks/netherrack

host minecraft:soul_sand
type sand
hardness 0.5
texture minecraft:blocks/soul_sand

host minecraft:end_stone
type stone
hardness 3.0
texture minecraft:blocks/end_stone

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay
type stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_white

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay:1
type stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_orange

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay:2
type stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_magenta

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay:3
type stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_light_blue

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay:4
type stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_yellow

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay:5
type stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_lime

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay:6
type stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_pink

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay:7
type stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_gray

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay:8
type stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_silver

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay:9
type stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_cyan

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay:10
type stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_purple

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay:11
type stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_blue

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay:12
type stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_brown

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay:13
type stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_green

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay:14
type stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_red

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay:15
type stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_black

host minecraft:red_sandstone
type stone
hardness 0.8
texture minecraft:blocks/red_sandstone_normal
textureUp minecraft:blocks/red_sandstone_top
textureDown minecraft:blocks/red_sandstone_bottom

# Ores

ore coal
oreDict oreCoal -
type stone
hardness 3.0
resistance 5.0
burnTime 1600
texture strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/coal
blockstate strata:generic_cube_y_overlay
convertsTo minecraft:coal
proxy minecraft:coal_ore

ore diamond
oreDict oreDiamond gemDiamond
type stone
hardness 3.0
resistance 5.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/diamond
blockstate strata:generic_cube_y_overlay
convertsTo minecraft:diamond
proxy minecraft:diamond_ore

ore emerald
oreDict oreEmerald gemEmerald
type stone
hardness 3.0
resistance 5.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/emerald
blockstate strata:generic_cube_y_overlay
convertsTo minecraft:emerald
proxy minecraft:emerald_ore

ore gold
oreDict oreGold
type stone
hardness 3.0
resistance 5.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/gold
blockstate strata:generic_cube_y_overlay
convertsTo minecraft:gold_ore
proxy minecraft:gold_ore

ore iron
oreDict oreIron
type stone
hardness 3.0
resistance 5.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/iron
blockstate strata:generic_cube_y_overlay
convertsTo minecraft:iron_ore
proxy minecraft:iron_ore

ore lapis
oreDict oreLapis gemLapis
type stone
hardness 3.0
resistance 5.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/lapis
blockstate strata:generic_cube_y_overlay
convertsTo minecraft:dye:4
proxy minecraft:lapis_ore

ore redstone
oreDict oreRedstone dustRedstone
type stone
hardness 3.0
resistance 5.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/redstone
blockstate strata:generic_cube_y_overlay
convertsTo minecraft:redstone
proxy minecraft:redstone_ore
